mapper.select: SELECT *FROM BOOKMARK B JOIN PROJECTBOARD P USING(BOARDNO) WHERE USERID=#{id}
SELECT B.*,P.*,W.*,SU.USERNAME FROM BOOKMARK B JOIN PROJECTBOARD P ON B.BOARDNO=P.BOARDNO JOIN WRITING W ON P.BOARDNO=W.BOARDNO JOIN STOOLUSER SU ON W.WRITINGID=SU.USERID WHERE B.USERID=#{id}
SELECT B.*,P.*,T.*,SU.USERNAME FROM BOOKMARK B JOIN PROJECTBOARD P ON B.BOARDNO=P.BOARDNO JOIN TASK T ON P.BOARDNO=T.BOARDNO JOIN STOOLUSER SU ON T.TASKID=SU.USERID WHERE B.USERID=#{id}
SELECT B.*,P.*,S.*,SU.USERNAME FROM BOOKMARK B JOIN PROJECTBOARD P ON B.BOARDNO=P.BOARDNO JOIN SCHEDULE S ON P.BOARDNO=S.BOARDNO JOIN STOOLUSER SU ON S.SCHEDULEID=SU.USERID WHERE B.USERID=#{id}
